note.p: Death: His house in Charterhouse Square, London (17 September 1730)
Education: Charterhouse School; Christ Church, Oxford; Jesus College, Cambridge; MB (1716), MD (1717)
Career: Lecturer in Anatomy, Company of Barber Surgeons (1720-1722); Physician, Charterhouse (1725-death)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Foster; Munk's roll; Dobson
